title: Admin dashboard with username/password authentication

requirements.text: Add a backend function to authenticate admin users with username/password credentials. The hardcoded admin username is 'azadnexus.global@gmail.com' and password is 'Karusu_7'. The function should return a session token or boolean success indicator upon valid credentials, and reject invalid ones.

quotes: we will access the admin panel dashboard with username and password
Username is azadnexus.global@gmail.com and password is Karusu_7

acceptanceCriteria: Backend exposes an adminLogin(username: Text, password: Text) function
Returns a success result when credentials match azadnexus.global@gmail.com / Karusu_7
Returns an error result for any other credentials
Credentials are stored/compared securely on the backend

requirements.text: Replace the Internet Identity-based admin authentication on the /admin page with a username/password login form. The login form should have fields for email and password, a submit button, and display an error message on invalid credentials. On successful login, show the buyer inquiries dashboard. Add a logout button to return to the login screen.

quotes: we will access the admin panel dashboard with username and password
Username is azadnexus.global@gmail.com and password is Karusu_7

acceptanceCriteria: The /admin route shows a login form with email and password fields before authentication
Submitting correct credentials (azadnexus.global@gmail.com / Karusu_7) grants access to the inquiries dashboard
Submitting incorrect credentials shows a visible error message
A logout button is visible on the dashboard and returns the user to the login form
The Internet Identity login flow is removed from the admin page
No 'Access Denied' error appears when using the correct credentials

constraints: Admin credentials must be validated on the backend, not in frontend code
Do not change any immutable frontend paths listed in the system context
Do not remove or break existing buyer inquiry submission or retrieval functionality
nonGoals: Multi-user admin accounts or role management
Internet Identity authentication for admin access
Persistent session across browser restarts (session can reset on page reload)
